nohuto/regkit: Reworked regedit including several new features. Contribute to nohuto/regkit development by creating an account on GitHub.
nohuto/win-registry: Registry activity records & DXG Kernel/Session Manager/Power/DWM/USBHUB/BCDEdit/NIC/StorNVMe values research.
nohuto/nvapi-cli: CLI for NvAPI - currently supports ~400. Contribute to nohuto/nvapi-cli development by creating an account on GitHub.
nohuto/aes-cbc: PowerShell encryption using AES CBC - 256 bit encryption key.
nohuto/bitmask-calc: Bitmask calculator uses official NVIDIA definitions to edit and apply registry values with bitfield mapping.
nohuto/blocklist-mgr: GUI that lets you easily select one or more blocklists (hosts or URLs, e.g., for UBO).
nohuto/comp-mgr: Manage components (packages, optional features, capabilities) easily within a single tool.
nohuto/app-tools: Automatic app configurations tools for Discord, Spotify, Thorium, Steam, Ungoogled, Brave, SteelSeries, Epic Games, LGHUB, Wallpaper Engine.
nohuto/game-tools: Automatic game configuration tools for VALORANT, Fortnite, Marvel Rivals, CS2, Overwatch.
nohuto/sym-dump: Lists all modules and dumps the memory addresses of each symbol from the selected module.
nohuto/nvfetch: CL OS/HW information tool. Contribute to nohuto/nvfetch development by creating an account on GitHub.
nohuto/void: PowerShell obfuscation using binary & whitespaces, resulting in a empty looking file.
nohuto/minifier: Removes unnecessary content (extra spaces...), formatting, replaces cmdlets/parameters/operators with their alias to create a "minified" version of the script.
nohuto/ps12bat: Converts .ps1 code to a standalone .bat file using B64.
nohuto/b64-char: Takes a single string as input and converts it to a character array.
nohuto/admx-parser: Parses PolicyDefinitions folder to JSON/YAML format.
nohuto/hash-gen: Computes cryptographic hash values (Get-FileHash valid ones), works via the context menu.
nohuto/strings2-tui: An improved string extraction tool, including a TUI.
nohuto/b64rev: Encodes with B64, reverts them & builds the decoding part.
nohuto/dism-wsim: Guide on how to create your own customized and automated Windows installation using DISM, WSIM and more.
nohuto/reg2bat: A simple CL tool that converts .reg to .bat. Contribute to nohuto/reg2bat development by creating an account on GitHub.
nohuto/pbo2-uv: Guide on how to set up PBO using curve optimizer. Contribute to nohuto/pbo2-uv development by creating an account on GitHub.
nohuto/gpu-oc-uv: Guide on how to OC/UV your GPU via MSI Afterburner.
